pullRequest.title: Issue #2248: Fix various ContractMarket exceptions when operating at the bounds of MekHQ data
pullRequest.bodyText: The AtB Contract Market does not enjoy being at the bounds of playable data. This PR just adds a few checks to have it more gracefully fail instead of throwing exceptions and blocking the campaign's forward progress. This sort of fixes #2248 at a wishy-washy level.

commit.message: Have ContractMarket more gracefully deal with tough situations #2248
Avoid infinite loop if we can only generate MERC employers #2248
Improve debug message when factions cannot be found
